Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitCustomerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitCustomerService
public interface FlipFitCustomerInterface
Interface defining the operations that can be performed by a customer in the FlipFit system. This includes creating and editing customer profiles as well as retrieving a list of gym centers by city.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createProfile(String username, String password, String name, String address, String phoneNumber, Double weight, Integer age, String gender, LocalDate dob)
    Creates a new customer profile.
    void
    editProfile(String customerId, String address, Double weight, Integer age, String gender, LocalDate dob)
    Edits an existing customer profile.
    List<FlipFitCentre>
    getCentreListByCity(String city)
    Retrieves a list of gym centers located in a specific city.

  • Method Details

    • createProfile

      void createProfile(String username, String password, String name, String address, String phoneNumber, Double weight, Integer age, String gender, LocalDate dob) throws ExistingUserException
      Creates a new customer profile.
      Parameters:
      username - the username for the new customer
      password - the password for the new customer
      name - the name of the new customer
      address - the address of the new customer
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the new customer
      weight - the weight of the new customer
      age - the age of the new customer
      gender - the gender of the new customer
      dob - the date of birth of the new customer
      Throws:
      ExistingUserException - if a user with the same username already exists

    • editProfile

      void editProfile(String customerId, String address, Double weight, Integer age, String gender, LocalDate dob) throws InvalidUserException
      Edits an existing customer profile.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the unique identifier of the customer whose profile is to be edited
      address - the updated address of the customer
      weight - the updated weight of the customer
      age - the updated age of the customer
      gender - the updated gender of the customer
      dob - the updated date of birth of the customer
      Throws:
      InvalidUserException - if the customer ID is invalid or if the operation fails

    • getCentreListByCity

      List<FlipFitCentre> getCentreListByCity(String city)
      Retrieves a list of gym centers located in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - the city for which to retrieve the list of gym centers
      Returns:
      a List of FlipFitCentre objects representing gym centers in the specified city
